title: The 2025 Meme Rewind: The 12 Viral Moments That Defined the Year
excerpt: The definitive ranking of 2025's best memes. From the '6-7' trend and Steve the Fish to the Coldplay Kiss Cam, explore the 12 viral moments that broke the internet this year.
author: Ruthvik Reddy

title: Rumor: Half-Life 3 Eyed as 2026 Steam Machine Launch Title
excerpt: Reports indicate Valve aims to bundle the long-awaited sequel possibly titled Half-Life: Xen with a next gen console in 2026.
author: Ruthvik Reddy
quote: Fresh reports suggest the decades long wait for Gordon Freeman's return may finally target a 2026 release window.
authors_note: These are still rumours. Valve has not confirmed these claims. We keep the hopium pumping.

title: The 6:17 Tragedy: How SkyCrab1 Lost the Greatest Minecraft Run Ever
excerpt: One accidental glance cost a runner a legendary sub 6:30 finish and the most dominant world record in history. Biggest Choke in speedrunning history.
author: Ruthvik Reddy
quote: This is the most depressing thing ive ever seen in my life
authors_note: This speedrun is very depressing to watch. Huge congratulations to Skycrab1 for achieving this run even if it did not end his way.

content.heading: Skycrab1's 6:17 Speedrunning Choke
content.text: SkyCrab1 was on track for a historic breakthrough, utilizing an exceptional seed with a Looting 3 diamond sword to achieve lightning fast splits. Entering the Stronghold twenty seconds ahead of the world record pace, he was set to shatter the standing record by forty-seven seconds. A completion would have effectively killed the category, setting a sub 6:30 time so perfect it would discourage future competition by making the top spot seem unreachable. However, his blistering pace left him without defensive blocks for the Ender Dragon fight. While crafting items for his bed cycles, he accidentally looked at an Enderman for a fraction of a second. Though he managed to slay the dragon, the aggroed Enderman struck him down in the fountain at the final moment, transforming a world record into the most devastating choke the community has ever seen.
